definition: Feng Jicai (1942-), novelist from Tianjin, author of Extraordinary people in our ordinary world 俗世奇人
to gallop/to assist/to attack/to wade/great/old variant of 憑|凭[ping2]
ability/talent/sb of a certain type/a capable individual/only/only then/just now

sentences.english: This was the first characteristic of Feng's earlier writing.
sentences.chinese: 這是馮驥才初期作品的第一大特點。
